synopsis.text: As autumn arrives, Makoto Yuki and his comrades in S.E.E.S. continue their perilous battle against supernatural Shadows, hoping to put an end to the mysterious Dark Hour that has claimed so many lives. Through their struggles, the group contends with tragic loss that forces them to consider what is most precious. The arrival of transfer student Ryoji Mochizuki brings new mysteries. His identity sparks questions and tensions within S.E.E.S., particularly with Aigis. As bonds between the group are tested, they soon realize their fight is far from over. With the dawn of each new day, Makoto and his loyal friends steel themselves for the continuing fight ahead â€“ one that will reveal the very purpose that connects them.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
